% Model with a minimal amount of element types. To test aba.

fixedbase base

rotjoint j0 0 0 1
rigidbody b2 0 1 0 0 0 0   1   1
rotjoint j1 1 0 0
rigidbody b2 0 1 0 0 0 0   1   1

		

endmodel
